Nemesis Enforcer/Dark One/Pyro:

::Nemesis motioned for the three other Alliance members with him to follow, 
stepping into the clearing where Ramjet, Dirge, and Skywarp were::

::Raising his rapid firing laser rifle, Nemesis fired off several lasers into 
the air::
"Hello.  Now that I have your attention," Nemesis said, all the Alliance 
members with him's weapons raised at the three, "I would like to say on 
behalf of Zardus, leader of the Alliance, the strongest group in the Beast 
Wars, we wish you to join the Alliance.  What do you say?"
